enWisdom: Forbearance is a means of silencing the foolish

Wisdom: الْحِلْمُ عِنْدَ شِدَّةِ الْغَضَبِ يُؤَمِّنُ غَضَبَ الْجَبَّارِ
enWisdom: Forbearance during intense rage protects [one] from the wrath of the Almighty

Wisdom: أَوَّلُ عِوَضِ الْحَلِيمِ عَنْ حِلْمِهِ أَنَّ النَّاسَ كُلَّهُمْ أَنْصَارُهُ عَلَى خَصْمِهِ
enWisdom: The first compensation for the forbearing person from his forbearance is that all the people are [ready to be] his helpers against his enemy
Through forbearance, supporters increase

Wisdom: بِالاحْتِمَالِ وَالْحِلْمِ يَكُونُ لَكَ النَّاسُ أَنْصَاراً وَأَعْوَاناً
enWisdom: Through tolerance and forbearance, people become your helpers and supporters

Wisdom: الْحِلْمُ يُطْفِئُ نَارَ الْغَضَبِ وَالْحِدَّةُ تُؤَجِّجُ إِحْرَاقَهُ
enWisdom: Forbearance puts out the fire of rage and acrimoniousness stokes it
Be forbearing and you will be honoured
One who shows forbearance is honoured
Be forbearing and you will be respected

Wisdom: إِنْ كَانَ فِي الْغَضَبِ الِانْتِصَارُ فَفِي الْحِلْمِ ثَوَابُ الْأَبْرَارِ
enWisdom: If in anger there is revenge, then in forbearance there is the reward of the virtuous

Wisdom: تَجَرُّعُ غُصَصِ الْحِلْمِ يُطْفِئُ نَارَ الْغَضَبِ
enWisdom: Gulping down the agonies of forbearance extinguishes the fire of anger
The fruit of forbearance is kindness
Repel [fits of] rage with forbearance
The cause of reverence is forbearance

Wisdom: ضَادُّوا الْغَضَبَ بِالْحِلْمِ تَحْمِدُوا عَوَاقِبَكُمْ فِي كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
enWisdom: Counter anger with forbearance and you will make your results praiseworthy in every matter
Forbearance is sufficient as veneration
One whose tolerance increases becomes noble

Wisdom: مَنْ غَلَبَ عَقْلُهُ شَهْوَتَهُ وَحِلْمُهُ غَضَبَهُ كَانَ جَدِيراً بِحُسْنِ السِّيرَةِ
enWisdom: One whose intellect prevails over his lust and his forbearance [overcomes] his anger, then he is worthy of [being deemed as having] good conduct
One who adorns himself with forbearance, his recklessness subsides

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَحْمِلْ قِيلًا [قَلِيلًا] لَمْ يَسْمَعْ جَمِيلًا
enWisdom: One who does not make his speech appropriate (or is not able to bear [others’] speech) does not hear beautiful words

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَعَانَ بِالْحِلْمِ عَلَيْكَ غَلَبَكَ وَتَفَضَّلَ عَلَيْكَ
enWisdom: One who seeks the support of forbearance against you defeats you and acts graciously towards you
Show clemency and you will be put forward (or you will advance)

Wisdom: وَجَدْتُ الْحِلْمَ وَالِاحْتِمَالَ أَنْصَرَ لِي مِنْ شُجْعَانِ الرِّجَالِ
enWisdom: I found forbearance and tolerance more helpful to me than courageous men
There is no dignity loftier than forbearance
The bane of forbearance is humiliation
Sometimes the forbearing person may get fed up
A person who is not forbearing may at times dress in the garb of forbearance
